title: docs: comprehensive documentation revamp
body:
## Summary

Complete rewrite of the SkiaSharp.Extended documentation site with modern, conceptual content.

## Changes

### New Documentation Pages
- **Blur Hash** (`blurhash.md`) - MAUI converter example, component comparison screenshots
- **Geometry Helpers** (`geometry.md`) - Shape overview with visual examples
- **Path Interpolation** (`path-interpolation.md`) - Animation guide with step visualization
- **Lottie Animations** (`lottie.md`) - Airbnb origin story, playback control patterns
- **Confetti Effects** (`confetti.md`) - Particle system guide with customization examples

### Landing Page
- Getting started with NuGet installation
- MAUI handler registration example
- Feature overview with preview images

### Site Structure
- Flattened TOC with friendly feature names
- Added "Resources" section for migration guides
- Removed old API-reference style files

### Generated Assets
- `components-comparison.png` - BlurHash component count comparison
- `punch-comparison.png` - BlurHash punch value comparison
- `shapes-overview.png` - Geometry shapes overview
- `polygon-variations.png` - Regular polygon examples (3-8 sides)
- `star-variations.png` - Star variations (4-8 points)
- `interpolation-steps.png` - Path interpolation t=0 to t=1

### SVG Migration Guide (from original PR)
- Guide for migrating from SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg to Svg.Skia
- Package version updates and API mapping

## Motivation

Transform documentation from raw API reference style to friendly, conceptual guides that help developers discover features and learn usage patterns.
